title: Apple iPhone 13 Pro Max
description: The iPhone 13 Pro Max features a 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display, 5G capability, and the new A15 Bionic chip for faster performance.

features.other: Ceramic Shield front cover, IP68 water resistance

title: Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra 5G
description: The Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra comes with a 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display and an ultra-high-resolution camera for professional-grade photography.

title: Sony WH-1000XM4 Wireless Headphones
description: Industry-leading noise-canceling headphones with up to 30 hours of battery life, adaptive sound control, and touch-sensitive controls.

features.other: Adaptive Sound Control, Alexa voice control

title: Fitbit Charge 4 Fitness and Activity Tracker
description: Track your heart rate, sleep patterns, and activities with built-in GPS and over 7 days of battery life. It's your ultimate fitness companion.

features.battery: Up to 7 days of battery life
features.other: Built-in GPS, heart rate tracking, sleep tracking

title: Echo Dot (4th Gen) | Smart speaker with Alexa
description: The Echo Dot lets you play music, control smart devices, and ask questions using only your voice, with improved sound and a sleek design.

features.audio: Improved sound quality with Dolby processing
features.other: Control smart home devices, set alarms, play music

title: Nintendo Switch Console
description: The Nintendo Switch is a hybrid console, perfect for gaming at home or on the go, featuring a 6.2-inch screen and detachable controllers.

features.other: Hybrid design, handheld and docked play

title: Apple AirPods Pro
description: Active Noise Cancellation and Transparency mode provide an immersive listening experience. Includes a custom fit with three sizes of soft silicone tips.

features.battery: Up to 4.5 hours of listening time
features.other: Custom fit with three sizes of silicone tips

title: Amazon Fire TV Stick 4K
description: Stream content in 4K UHD with Dolby Vision, HDR, and HDR10+ using the Fire TV Stick. Comes with Alexa Voice Remote for easy control.

title: Keurig K-Elite Coffee Maker
description: Brew your favorite coffee, iced coffee, and tea with the Keurig K-Elite. Features strong brew for a bolder cup and a large 72 oz water reservoir.

features.control: Strong brew option for bolder coffee

title: HP 15.6-inch Laptop
description: This laptop features an Intel Core i5 processor, 8GB of RAM, and a 256GB SSD for fast performance and multitasking. Perfect for home or office use.

features.battery: Up to 8 hours of battery life

title: OnePlus 9 Pro 5G
description: The OnePlus 9 Pro 5G features a 6.7-inch Fluid AMOLED display, Snapdragon 888 chipset, and a quad-camera setup for versatile photography.

title: Bose QuietComfort 35 II
description: The Bose QuietComfort 35 II offers excellent noise-canceling capabilities and 20 hours of battery life for long listening sessions.

title: Google Nest Thermostat
description: The Google Nest Thermostat helps you save energy by automatically adjusting your home’s temperature based on your preferences.

features.voice_control: Works with Google Assistant and Alexa

title: Dell XPS 13
description: Dell's XPS 13 is a powerful ultrabook with a 13.4-inch 4K UHD display, 11th Gen Intel Core i7, and an 8GB RAM configuration.

features.battery: Up to 12 hours of battery life

title: PlayStation 5 Console
description: The PlayStation 5 offers enhanced graphics, fast load times, and a new controller for a next-generation gaming experience.

features.other: DualSense wireless controller with haptic feedback

title: Xiaomi Mi 11X Pro
description: The Xiaomi Mi 11X Pro comes with a Snapdragon 888 processor, 6.67-inch AMOLED display, and a 108MP camera.

title: Realme Narzo 30 Pro
description: Realme Narzo 30 Pro features a 6.5-inch FHD+ display, MediaTek Dimensity 800U, and a 48MP AI camera for stunning shots.

title: JBL Tune 750BTNC
description: The JBL Tune 750BTNC provides active noise cancellation, 15 hours of battery life, and deep bass for an immersive listening experience.

title: Garmin Forerunner 245 Music
description: The Garmin Forerunner 245 Music features built-in GPS, heart rate monitoring, and music storage for a true workout companion.

title: Wyze Cam v3
description: Wyze Cam v3 features HD video quality, motion detection, and cloud storage with a built-in siren for enhanced security.

title: Oppo Reno 5 Pro 5G
description: Oppo Reno 5 Pro 5G features a 6.55-inch AMOLED display, MediaTek Dimensity 1000+ processor, and 64MP quad-camera system.

title: Samsung Galaxy Watch 3
description: The Samsung Galaxy Watch 3 provides fitness tracking, sleep monitoring, and has built-in ECG functionality for heart health.

features.fitness_tracking: Heart rate monitoring, step tracking, GPS

title: Vivo V21e
description: Vivo V21e features a 6.44-inch AMOLED display, MediaTek Dimensity 700 processor, and a 44MP dual front camera for selfies.

title: Philips Hue White and Color Ambiance Starter Kit
description: The Philips Hue Starter Kit includes smart bulbs that allow you to control your lighting with your voice or mobile app.

features.other: Compatible with Alexa and Google Assistant

title: Acer Aspire 5
description: Acer Aspire 5 features an Intel Core i3 processor, 4GB RAM, and a 256GB SSD, offering solid performance for work and light gaming.

title: Samsung Galaxy M32
description: Samsung Galaxy M32 features a 6.4-inch FHD+ AMOLED display, MediaTek Helio G80 processor, and a 64MP quad-camera setup.

title: Poco X3 Pro
description: Poco X3 Pro features a Snapdragon 860 chipset, 6.67-inch FHD+ display, and a 48MP quad-camera setup for high-quality photos.

title: iQOO 7 Legend
description: iQOO 7 Legend offers a Snapdragon 888 processor, 6.62-inch AMOLED display, and a 48MP triple-camera setup for professional photography.

title: Realme X7 Max
description: Realme X7 Max comes with MediaTek Dimensity 1200, 6.43-inch Super AMOLED display, and a 64MP triple-camera setup.

title: Samsung Galaxy A52 5G
description: Samsung Galaxy A52 5G features a 6.5-inch Super AMOLED display, Snapdragon 750G chipset, and a 64MP quad-camera setup.
